org.echo.mobile.framework.service

Interface AccountHistoryApiService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApiService, CustomOperationService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountHistoryApiServiceImpl

    public AccountHistoryApiService
extends ApiService, CustomOperationService

    Encapsulates logic, associated with blockchain account history API

    Graphene blockchain account history API

    See Also:
    Graphene blockchain account history API

    • Method Detail

      • getAccountHistory

        void getAccountHistory(java.lang.String accountId,
                       java.lang.String start,
                       java.lang.String stop,
                       int limit,
                       Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.HistoryResponse> callback)

        Get operations relevant to the specified account

        Parameters:
        accountId - : The account whose history should be queried
        start - : ID of the most recent operation to retrieve
        stop - : ID of the earliest operation to retrieve
        limit - : Maximum number of operations to retrieve (must not exceed 100)

      • getAccountHistory

        Result<java.lang.Exception,org.echo.mobile.framework.model.HistoryResponse> getAccountHistory(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                              java.lang.String start,
                                                                                              java.lang.String stop,
                                                                                              int limit)

        Get operations relevant to the specified account in synchronous way

        Parameters:
        accountId - : The account whose history should be queried
        start - : ID of the most recent operation to retrieve
        stop - : ID of the earliest operation to retrieve
        limit - : Maximum number of operations to retrieve (must not exceed 100)
        Returns:
        A list of operations performed by account, ordered from most recent to oldest
